author: NodeEditor
description: LLM integration plugin powered by LlmTornado. Provides chat completion, embeddings, vision, and utility nodes.
longDescription:
# LLM Tornado Plugin

Integrates LLM capabilities into NodeEditor.Net via the LlmTornado library.

## Features
- Simple Chat completion
- Structured chat with message building
- Text embeddings
- Vision / multi-modal support
- Conversation history management
- Prompt formatting utilities
- Token estimation

## Configuration
Set the `LLMTORNADO_API_KEY` and `LLMTORNADO_PROVIDER` environment variables before running.
releaseNotes: Initial release with core chat, embedding, vision, and utility nodes.
